title: Out of range error.
body: After the recent update I'm unable to play the game, after champ select I get a black screen saying out of range. I've tried modifying the resolution through the config file (tried a low resolution and the resolution my display is set to) but to no avail. The game thought I was connected and my team couldn't /remake which cost me and my friend 20 lp and a 20 minute leaverbuster ban. Need help asap.

replies.body: Launched the game in windowed mode and it works fine , kinda sucks that I'm forced to play in this mode and have to deal with 5 20 minute bans because of an issue affecting multiple players.
Agree same thing happening to me lost game cause i actually had to switch monitor.

I have a Dell Gaming S2716DG 27.0" Screen LED-Lit Monitor with G-SYNC, GeForce Windforce GTX 980 TI, and an Avocent KVM switch to switch between my work laptop and gaming rig.

Was able to play last night - logged in this morning to play a game before work, patched, and during game load (after champ select), screen flickers off and on for about 1 minute and then goes blank starting sleep mode.

Appears to be a sync issue similar to selecting a resolution higher than your screen is capable of displaying. Tried disabling GSYNC to troubleshoot in game, apologized to the people I was playing with and told them my screen isn't stabilizing. I can't adjust options in game, thought I'd try and change display settings and see if that would fix the issue. 

Edit: Just to add, I normally play at 2560x1440.
There's currently a [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page screen issues upon loading in-game.  Try the current work around of pressing  "Alt+Enter."  Let me know if that helps!
